alert.note: Alert for Edmonson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 3:30PM EDT until August 06 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WARREN AND SOUTHWESTERN EDMONSON COUNTIES... At 229 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were from near Brownsville to 11 miles northwest of Glasgow, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mammoth Cave National Park, Brownsville, Smiths Grove, Oakland, Chalybeate, Rhoda, Lindseyville, Girkin, Black Gold, Nick, and Tuckertown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
